theme: ðŸŽ¤ Rolling Stone Names '200 Greatest Singers of All Time'

questions.question: Extremely beautiful, impressive, or admirable. (Splendid, grand, glorious)
Widely recognized and admired, especially as a representative symbol. (Symbolic, legendary, emblematic)
Impossible to forget or remove. (Permanent, lasting, unforgettable)
Gradually developing or changing over time. (Changing, progressing, adapting)
A person who is among the first to explore or develop something. (Trailblazer, innovator, pathfinder)
Accepted without challenge or doubt. (Unquestioned, uncontested, certain)
A strong and adverse reaction to an idea or event. (Repercussion, resistance, opposition)
Producing a large amount of something, especially works of art. (Productive, creative, fertile)
To be highly conspicuous or draw strong attention. (Stand out, shine, attract attention)
The quality of being trusted or believed. (Trustworthiness, reliability, validity)
